id.title: Event ID
id.description: Unique identifier for this captured request

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: UTC time of the incoming request

webhookId.title: Webhook ID
webhookId.description: Unique ID of the target webhook endpoint

body.title: Body
body.description: The raw or parsed request body

contentType.title: Content-Type
contentType.description: MIME type of the request body

processingTime.title: Latency (ms)
processingTime.description: Time taken to process the request

statusCode.title: Status
statusCode.description: HTTP response status code returned to the sender
